question.text: Who most likely is Liz Bradley?

answer.explanation: Based on the messages she texted to Bernie Gibbs about the arragements and reserving a table at Sheraton Restaurant

question.text: Why was Michael Steel added to the conversation?
choices: (A) To have him give an update about the missing reports
(B) To inform him about the upcoming meeting
(C) To let him know about the deadline
(D) To scold him for his lack of punctuality

answer.text: (A) To have him give an update about the missing reports
answer.explanation: Because Bernie Gibbs asked Liz Bradley to contact Michael Steel and see what's going on.

question.text: What does Michael imply when he says he “had to scour the database to locate the backup material”?
choices: (A) He took his time writing the report.
(B) He had to back up all the information first.
(C) He needed time to find the missing data.
(D) The computer was out of order.

answer.text: (C) He needed time to find the missing data.
answer.explanation: Because the intern accidentally deleted some files.

question.text:
Turner & Co.

158 Baskin Road, Redwood Bay, UK
Phone: 243-555-1541

HOME ABOUT US PRODUCTS REPLACEMENT CONTACT US

Turner & Co. has produced beautiful, energy-efficient windows that meet the taste and expectations of our customers since its founding in 1949. When you choose Turner & Co., you are buying more than just a window. You will be receiving the excellent services of our professionals who have been performing superb work for decades. We are passionate about helping you choose a quality window that exactly fits the specifications of your home. Additionally, we are fully committed to environmental protection and have recently been recognized for our sustainable business practices by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA).
What is being advertised?

answer.explanation: "Turner & Co. has produced beautiful, energy-efficient windows that meet the taste and expectations of our customers since its founding in 1949." Inferring from this, we can see that Turner & Co is a company which manufacture windows.

question.text: What is indicated about Turner & Co.?
choices: (D) It has recently hired experienced employees.

answer.explanation: It can be inferred in"Additionally, we are fully committed to environmental protection and have recently been recognized for our sustainable business practices by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA)."

question.text: Why was the message sent?

answer.explanation: Because Sam Bell asked Jane Brooks to let him know Mr. Fraser's phone number.

question.text: What is indicated about Mr. Bell?
choices: (A) He is unable to attend a meeting.
(C) He is trying to meet a deadline.

answer.text: (C) He is trying to meet a deadline.
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "I am a little behind schedule on the monthly financial report and I need to dedicate all my time to it today."

question.text: SEOUL (July 19) - Breamin's Group opened the doors to its first B&G clothing shop on the famed Abgujeong Rodeo street in South Korea to long lines of frantic shoppers. - [1] - The frenzy was over the limited edition line designed by Marichio Bucci in partnership with B&G. Within just a couple of hours of opening the doors, most of the Bucci design items were sold out. Similar reports of chaos and empty shelves which once held items from the Bucci line were echoed in major cities around the world including New York, London, Tokyo, and Milan. - [2] - Although B&G has released limited edition collaborations with other famous designers, this is the first time that B&G shops have reported a complete depletion of items within hours of its release. The Bucci and B&G collaboration is the most successful to date and, already, talks are in progress over future collaborations for more clothing lines. - [3] - Meanwhile in Seoul, shoppers who were unable to purchase from the Bucci line were disappointed but excited to have the popular retailer open in Korea. - [4] –
What is indicated about B&G?
choices: (A) They have stores around the world.
(B) They only sell items designed by Bucci.
(C) The company has a few branches in Korea.
(D) Their products usually sell out within hours.

answer.text: (A) They have stores around the world.
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from:"Breamin's Group opened the doors to its first B&G clothing shop on the famed Abgujeong Rodeo street in South Korea to long lines of frantic shoppers.....Similar reports of chaos and empty shelves which once held items from the Bucci line were echoed in major cities around the world including New York, London, Tokyo, and Milan." that B&G Group have stores in many countries.

question.text: What is reported about the Bucci and B&G collaboration?
choices: (A) It took years to put together.
(B) It was only sold in select stores,
(C) It’s one of the most profitable collaborations for the company.
(D) It will only be a one-time event.

answer.text: (C) It’s one of the most profitable collaborations for the company.
answer.explanation: "The Bucci and B&G collaboration is the most successful to date and, already, talks are in progress over future collaborations for more clothing lines."

question.text:
In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3] and [4] does the following sentence belong?
“This is a first for the company since all previous limited designer edition lines were simply a one-time partnership.”

answer.explanation: Because the sentence mentioned about the sucessful colloboration between Bucci and B&G group.

question.text:
To:All Staff
From:Elizabeth Paine
Date:January 24
Subject:Sick Leave

Attention employees,

We are going to make adjustments to our policies concerning sick leave here at Zimnet Corporation. We are considering reducing the number of paid vacation days and instead increasing the number of paid sick days available to employees. Before we make any changes, we would like to gather the opinions of employees on this matter. Please e-mail Tony Nugent at tonynugent@zimnet.com. He will be collecting and analyzing your responses. Afterward, Management will produce a corresponding policy proposal by February 24. Once the proposal has been made, a meeting will be called to discuss its implementation among all of our employees. I hope this process can be helpful to all of our employees, and please be active in your participation.

Sincerely,
What is the purpose of the memo?

answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "Before we make any changes, we would like to gather the opinions of employees on this matter."

question.text: Who most likely is Mr. Nugent?

answer.explanation: Because in the memo, Mr. Nugent is mentioned to be the one who will be collecting and analyzing employees' responses.

question.text: According to the memo, what will Ms. Paine probably do soon after February 24?

answer.explanation: Based on the information in: "Afterward, Management will produce a corresponding policy proposal by February 24. Once the proposal has been made, a meeting will be called to discuss its implementation among all of our employees.", a meeting will be called after the proposal has been made.

question.text: What kind of business does the client most likely own?

answer.explanation: In the third message, Neil Park said: "The handles are complete and about half the bags are near completion."

question.text: According to the conversation, whose department must complete the work first?

answer.explanation: Based on Karen Norman's message, you can see that he said most of the leather had been cut, they had already sent many of the pieces to be sewn and the rest of the work should take a couple of hours, which means his department will complete the work first.

question.text: At 3:31, why does Lauren Nichols say “We’re currently working on the Jenk and Cenk twin’s orders”?
choices: (A) To inform everyone that they have their own clients
(B) To explain why they refuse to help
(C) To imply that they are busy with another project
(D) To make everyone speed up their work

answer.text: (C) To imply that they are busy with another project
answer.explanation: He wanted to remind the others about the project when Penny Jones asked about the time it took to get the hardware attached or sewn in.

question.text: What will Penny Jones most likely tell Mr. Patrick?
choices: (A) That his order will be finished two weeks later
(B) That his request can be fulfilled
(C) That his order will cost him extra money
(D) That there may be a delay to his order

answer.text: (B) That his request can be fulfilled
answer.explanation: In the last message of Kevin Harding, he confirmed that it would take only a couple of hours to have the order packaged safely to be shipped. Therefore, Penny Jones want the client to know about his request on his order.

question.text:
Business Hours in Early March

Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday
2:00-9:00 PM 2:00-8:00 PM 3:00-9:00 PM 4:00-9:00 PM 2:00-9:00 PM 2:00-10:00 PM 9:00 AM -6:00 PM

 

Due to the current construction on Shilling Street, we have been forced to revise our business hours for the first week in March (see the chart above.) During the morning hours, the construction makes it difficult for customers to reach our location by car. We will be extending our evening hours to accommodate this change. Additionally, due to the construction, our parking lot is also currently inaccessible. Therefore, during this period, customers are asked to utilize public parking spaces available on Patch Street. We apologize for this inconvenience and strive to be back to normal soon.
What is being announced?

answer.explanation: It can be inferred from: 'Due to the current construction on Shilling Street, we have been forced to revise our business hours for the first week in March."

question.text: When most likely is the construction NOT being performed?

answer.explanation: Based on the information showed on the chart, on Sunday, the business hours is from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m., which means the construction will not affect the customers reaching the location by car. Therefore, it is not performed on Sunday.

question.text: Why are customers asked to go to Patch Street?
choices: (A) To find a place to park
(B) To visit a new store location
(C) To take part in a promotional event

answer.text: (A) To find a place to park
answer.explanation: Therefore, during this period, customers are asked to utilize public parking spaces available on Patch Street.

question.text:
For Sale by Owner

Palmer standard Cabin Yacht


Asking price: $45,000 or best offer

Basic Specifications:
This boat was built four years ago. It is 12 feet wide by 36 feet long. The hull is made of fiberglass, making it light yet strong. The boat includes 2 double bedrooms as well as a sleeper sofa, kitchen, and bathroom.

Features:
This boat is very stable and offers a spacious deck. It is perfect for large \ families and social gatherings. It includes an eight-speaker sound system 1 with USB connectivity. It also has a lockable storage compartment where personal belongings can be kept.

Additional Information:
I have owned and operated this boat for three and a half years. The boat comes with a five-year warranty that still has one and a half years

If you would like to see or test-ride the boat, contact Gary Thompson at 654-555-8715.
What is indicated about the Palmer Standard Cabin Yacht?
choices: (B) Its original paint color has been changed.
(C) It can accommodate a group of people.

answer.text: (C) It can accommodate a group of people.
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "It is perfect for large \ families and social gatherings."

question.text: What is NOT mentioned as a feature of the Palmer standard Cabin Yacht?

answer.explanation:
(A) - It includes an eight-speaker sound system 1 with USB connectivity.
(B) - The hull is made of fiberglass, making it light yet strong.
C - The boat includes 2 double bedrooms as well as a sleeper sofa, kitchen, and bathroom.

question.text: What most likely is true about Mr. Thompson?
choices: (A) He will give a boat tour to a potential buyer.
(D) He wants to sell the warranty separately.

answer.text: (A) He will give a boat tour to a potential buyer.
answer.explanation: Based on the information in: "If you would like to see or test-ride the boat, contact Gary Thompson at 654-555-8715."

question.text:
Travel & Recreation

123 Gilmore street

Orange County, CA 48857


November 15
Mr. Peter Kang
3820 Rivervalley Heights
Seattle, WA 19387

We at Travel & Recreation thank you for your subscription to our magazine. As you have been a long time subscriber, I am excited to inform you about our new subscription plan for our VIP members. - [1] - As a member, you will continue to receive monthly editions of our magazine and access to our new online e-magazine services. You can simply download a digital version of the print magazine to any mobile device at no extra cost. -[2] - Furthermore, you can access background information about our authors, journalists, and guest writers, as well as detailed information about the locations and places that are covered in the magazine. In addition, you can access the recipes to the most popular restaurants around the world and, most exciting of all, we will hold an exclusive competition for our VIP members with a chance to win a trip for two to Hawaii. -[3] - Our regular subcribers, as well as VIP members, will have a chance to win a dining experience at 5-star restaurant Bellisimo.

Again we thank you for your continued support and we hope you enjoy the many changes we have made to our services as we strive to entertain and educate our loyal subscribers. - [4] - Please fill out the application form that is attached to this letter. Please check which subscription plan you wish to join. If you send in a $100 fee, you will receive the regular subscription plan. If you send in $200 fee, you will become a VIP member.

We appreciate your support and hope to hear from you soon.

Sincerely,
Victoria Adams
Why was a letter sent to Mr. Kang?
choices: (A) To remind him to send in his travel journals
(B) To explain about a new subscription plan
(C) To inquire about his travel plans
(D) To determine his qualifications for a position

answer.text: (B) To explain about a new subscription plan
answer.explanation: The information is in: "As you have been a long time subscriber, I am excited to inform you about our new subscription plan for our VIP members.'

question.text: What did Ms. Adams send with the letter?

answer.explanation: Based on the information in: "Please fill out the application form that is attached to this letter. ", we can see that Ms. Adam send an application form with the letter.

question.text: In the middle of the first paragraph of the letter, the term “at no extra cost” is closest in meaning to:

answer.explanation:
extra cost: added cost to normal cost
no extra cost means no more or no added cost, which has the same meaning with free.

question.text:
In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3] and [4] does the following sentence belong?
“Your subscription expires next month, but we invite you to consider joining our VIP membership.”

answer.explanation: In the second sentence of the letter, Ms. Adam mentioned about VIP members. And in the following sentence after [1], she also wrote: "As a member, you will continue to receive monthly editions of our magazine and access to our new online e-magazine services." which is related to subscription and membership.

question.text: @PS@/kstoeic/images/1368538_1564545582409.png@PE@

choices: (A) He is late for a lunch appointment
(B) He has accepted a new position.

answer.explanation: Based on Richard Hewitt's message: "I'll have the cab change directions and meet you there."

question.text: At 12:14, what does Mr. Hewitt mean when he writes, “Exactly!”?
choices: (A) He would like to know where they’re having lunch.
(B) He is looking forward to meeting Anderson & Wright.
(C) He is on his way back to the office.
(D) He would also like Anderson & Wright to join the project.

answer.text: (D) He would also like Anderson & Wright to join the project.
answer.explanation: He agrees with Tom Arnold.
